text:
「リヴァイ、リヴァイ…！」
激しく突かれ、リヴァイは気が遠くなりそうになりながらも、必死でシーツを掴んだ。 中に入ってくるエルヴィンが熱く、リヴァイは苦しみと共に耐えがたい甘さを感じ、首を逸らす。
エルヴィンはベッドの上で快感に悶える白い体を抱き潰し、そして小さな耳を口の中に入れ、舐める。 ピチャと水音が直接脳に響くようでリヴァイは体を震わせた。
「…んあっ、や、やめ…」
trans:
"Levi, Levi...!"
Relentless thrust into, Levi clung desperately to the sheets, feeling as if he were about to lose consciousness. Erwin inside him was hot, and Levi felt an unbearable sweetness along with the pain as he turned his head away.
Erwin pressed his writhing pale body into the bed, devouring him entirely. He took Levi's small ear into his mouth and licked it. The wet sounds seemed to echo directly in Levi's brain, causing him to tremble uncontrollably.
"...Ah, stop, stop it..."
